definition: policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
"Strategies of the Warring States", chronicle of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC), possibly written by Su Qin 蘇秦|苏秦[Su1 Qin2]

sentences.english: Good-neighborliness and Friendliness Policy is a basic policy of the country in our foreign affairs.
sentences.chinese: 睦鄰友好政策是我國外交工作中一項基本國策。

sentences.english: Consequently, to attract and to accept foreign immigrants have become a national policy long observed by Canada.
sentences.chinese: 吸收外來移民，是加拿大長期奉行的國策。

sentences.english: We set "opening to the outside world" as a basic state policy and embarked on the road of development oriented towards the world.
sentences.chinese: 把對外開放作爲基本國策，走面向世界的發展道路。

sentences.english: There are 101 verbs bringing double object in ZHAN GUO CE.
sentences.chinese: 《戰國策》雙賓結構動詞共計101個。

sentences.english: Today in China, protecting environment is regarded as a basic national policy.
sentences.chinese: 中國將環境保護作爲一項基本國策。

sentences.english: Chinese Gen Ys are single children born under China's one-child policy.
sentences.chinese: 代是在中國計劃生育國策下出生的獨生子女。

sentences.english: The socialization policy is key to the development of preschool education in China.
sentences.chinese: “幼兒教育社會化”是我國發展幼教事業的重要國策。

sentences.english: The family planning is one of the basic (national) policies of our country.
sentences.chinese: 計劃生育是我國的一項基本國策。

sentences.english: Family planning remains a basic state policy for China.
sentences.chinese: 計劃生育是中國的基本國策。

sentences.english: The third chapter is to discuss the mode of figural model.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探討了《戰國策》人物形象的塑造方式。

sentences.english: The Empire, in contrast, has made discrimination against non-humans a longstanding policy.
sentences.chinese: 相反，帝國則把歧視非人類種族當作一項長期國策。

sentences.english: Independent innovation is a great state policy of building the innovation-oriented country.
sentences.chinese: 自主創新是建設創新型國家的重大國策。

sentences.english: After Chen was elected Chang was named as one of his senior presidential advisors.
sentences.chinese: 陳當選後點名張擔任總統國策顧問的其中一員。

sentences.english: China is committed to saving resources and protecting the environment.
sentences.chinese: 節約資源和保護環境是中國的基本國策。

sentences.english: What is the most important reason behind the development of TVEs?
sentences.chinese: 我國的一項基本國策是發展鄉鎮企業。

sentences.english: Japan has developed so quickly owing to her strong polices in education.
sentences.chinese: 日本的高速發展全因爲發展教育的國策。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
state enterprise/(Tw) abbr. for 國際企業管理|国际企业管理, international business management (as a subject of study)
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
